title: Oscar Nominations: What Movies and Stars Might Win
summary: Today, the Oscar nominations will be announced, which are awards for movies. Some big movies like One Battle After Another and Sinners are expected to get many nominations. Actors like Leonardo DiCaprio and Wunmi Mosaku might be nominated. Other movies like Hamnet could also get recognition. The ceremony will be hosted by Conan O'Brien on March 15. Some popular movies like Wicked: For Good and Avatar: Fire and Ash might not get as many nominations as before. British actors might not get many nominations this year, but Irish actors like Jessie Buckley and Paul Mescal have a good chance. This is an exciting time to see which movies and stars will be honored.
